scripts.force-fetch-and-build-styles: npm explore @nkmjs/scripts -- npm run task context:%INIT_CWD% task:fetch-and-build-styles replace:true append:true
scripts.build-styles: npm explore @nkmjs/scripts -- npm run build-styles context:%INIT_CWD%
scripts.build-bundle: npm explore @nkmjs/scripts -- npm run task context:%INIT_CWD% task:bundle-for-web
scripts.nkmjs-init-config: npm explore @nkmjs/scripts -- npm run nkmjs-init-config context:%INIT_CWD%
scripts.init-nkmjs: npm explore @nkmjs/scripts -- npm run init-nkmjs context:%INIT_CWD%
